segments.text: Hi , Mary , Hi , Ken I hate to bring this up , but that new stereo , system you got ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You were playing it very late last night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It kept me awake a couple of hours .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm so sorry , I .. I didn't realize it was that loud .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was that loud , and it was pretty late , and check with Mary if you don't believe me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's true.It was a bit loud .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm very sorry . I didn't realize it . I promise I'll keep it down in the future .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , it's no problem.It ' s OK.You know , it only happened once .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am glad we've straightened everything out .
segments.speaker: S2
